name: Hiroshima
description: Do you like shots? Then try this creamy, herbal and sweet, absinthe and sambuca-based cocktail, alcoholic and strong.
directions: Pour 0.75 oz of sambuca into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.35 oz of Irish cream liqueur and 0.75 oz of absinthe
Carefully pour in 5 drops of grenadine syrup using a drinking straw
